channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Johnny's Blog

item.title: Exploring the speeches and letters of Abraham Lincoln
item.description: Preamble on ‘Project Gutenberg’ It’s been a little while since I’ve practiced text mining so I thought I would analyse some textual data provided by Project Gutenberg. In case you were not aware, Project Gutenberg consists of various articles and literary contributions (amongst other things) written, in the main, by authors whose works are now in the US public domain and largely exempt from any copyright infringement. For the UK, the law is that copyright applies to somebody else’s work until 70 years after their date of death.
